thread.title: Jose Mourinho singles out Man United star for praise: This is why he’s improved
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho singles out Man United star for praise: This is why he’s improved

title: Jose Mourinho singles out Man United star for praise: This is why he’s improved
text:
Jose Mourinho singles out Man United star for praise: This is why he’s improved JOSE MOURINHO has singled out Manchester United star Paul Pogba for praise. PUBLISHED: 22:24, Sat, Feb 11, 2017 | UPDATED: 22:39, Sat, Feb 11, 2017 
After a tricky start to life at Old Trafford, Paul Pogba has found his feet. 
Goals from Juan Mata and Anthony Martial helped Manchester United to a 2-0 win over Watford earlier today. 
Pogba had a few chances, but produced a disciplined display in the middle of the park to ensure United stretched their unbeaten record to 16 Premier League games. 
And Mourinho thinks the Frenchman has come on leaps and bounds in recent weeks. GETTY Paul Pogba produced a disciplined performance against Watford GETTY Jose Mourinho was impressed with Paul Pogba's display Manchester United player ratings against Watford Sat, February 11, 2017 Express Sport brings you our Manchester United player ratings from their clash with Watford at Old Trafford
